name: PostHog LLM Analytics
description: Send LLM traces, generations, and tool spans to PostHog

privacyMode.description: When enabled, LLM input/output content is not sent to PostHog

traceGrouping.description: Trace grouping mode. 'message': one trace per runId (default). 'session': group all generations in a session into one trace, splitting on timeout.

sessionWindowMinutes.description: Minutes of inactivity before starting a new session window. Applies to both trace grouping modes.

privacyMode.label: Privacy Mode
privacyMode.help: When enabled, LLM input/output content is not sent to PostHog

traceGrouping.label: Trace Grouping
traceGrouping.help: How to group LLM generations into traces. 'message' creates a new trace per message, 'session' groups an entire conversation into one trace.

sessionWindowMinutes.label: Session Window (minutes)
sessionWindowMinutes.help: Minutes of inactivity before starting a new session window. Applies to both trace grouping modes.
